name: CorruptionPerk Tweaks v 1.1
description:
Tweaks corruption perks to be more effective. Now their effects might be worth the loss of all that health, stamina and other perks for them.

Here's what is currently changed:
- Desecration and Tainted Vessel now ignore armor when dealing damage.
- Desecration now has a 15% chance of activating, instead of 5%.
- Twisted Flesh's chance to ignore damage is doubled.

Future Plans:
I want to make Demon Lord actually useful. Right now main problem with the perk isn't soemthing I can fix with a simple tweak. Demons can be summoned if you accidentally strike followers (even with a gathering tool) and may distract followers or outright get in fights with you. I am exploring ways to make this perk more reliable.
author: Necro
